That is not how it works. If an item or rune is the problem then the champion abuses it, but the champion is not the problem. Riot used to always nerf champions first and then nerf the item or rune that was OP and then just leave the champion weak. Nerf the new stuff first to balance it then nerf the Champion if they are still out of line is a much better philosophy and also shows that champions are not always the problem.
